attributes.action: remove tax on Biofuels to help stop the reliance on imported oil
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop the nations reliance on oil and move over to Biofuels, remove any duty (VAT) charged on Biofuels. There is only one fuel filling station in the UK where you can buy biofuel and its only slightly cheaper that unleaded. We should support renewable energy.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove tax on Biofuels to help stop the reliance on imported oil."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11026.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Biofuels-not-Oil/
